createwiki-close-email-body: Email body sent to the user when their wiki is closed.
createwiki-close-email-subject: Subject of the email sent when a wiki is closed.
createwiki-comment-success: Success message displayed when a comment is added to a wiki request.
createwiki-defaultmainpage: Default Main Page for all wikis created.
createwiki-defaultmainpage-summary: Edit summary used when creating the default Main Page for a new wiki.
createwiki-duplicate-comment: Message displayed when the user attempts to resubmit the same comment as the their previous request.
createwiki-email-body: Email body (if wiki requester has a registered email).
createwiki-email-subject: Email subject (if wiki requester has a registered email).
createwiki-error-agreement: Error message shown when the user does not agree to the terms in the wiki request form.
createwiki-error-cannot-edit-approved: Error message when attempting to edit a wiki request that has already been approved.
createwiki-error-dbexists: Used as error message when the database being created already exists.
createwiki-error-disallowed: Error message displayed when a disallowed subdomain is entered in the wiki request form.
createwiki-error-missingwiki: Error message given when a wiki does not exist. $1 is the wiki database name.
createwiki-error-notalnum: Used as error message when the database name entered does not contain non-alphanumeric characters.
createwiki-error-notlowercase: Used as error message when the database name entered contains uppercase letters.
createwiki-error-notsuffixed: Used as error message when the database name enter does not contain the suffix. $1 represents the allowed suffix.
createwiki-error-requestcountwarn: Used as a warning message shown to users with the createwiki right when the requester has more than a certain amount of requests.
createwiki-error-subdomaintaken: Error message shown when the requested subdomain is already taken.
createwiki-help-agreement: Help message for the 'agreement' checkbox in the wiki request form.
createwiki-help-bio: Help message for the 'biographical' checkbox in the wiki request form.
createwiki-help-category: Help message explaining the 'category' selection in the wiki request form.
createwiki-help-private: The word "its" refers to a wiki.
createwiki-help-reason: Help message for the 'reason' field in the wiki creation form.
createwiki-help-sitename: Don't translate "Project". Keep it written in English.
createwiki-help-subdomain: Help message for the 'subdomain' field in the wiki request form.
createwiki-label-all-languages:
Label for the 'All' option in the Language dropdown on Special:RequestWikiQueue.

{{Identical|All}}
createwiki-label-all-statuses:
Label for the 'All' option in the Status dropdown on Special:RequestWikiQueue.

{{Identical|All}}
createwiki-label-category:
Used as a label for category.
{{Identical|Category}}
createwiki-label-dbname:
Used as a label for dbname.
{{Identical|Database name}}
createwiki-label-lock: Label for the 'lock' checkbox in the request handling form.
createwiki-label-private: Used as a label for to mark the wiki as private.
createwiki-label-statuschangecomment: Label for the comment field when changing the status of a wiki request.
createwiki-no-changes: Error message displayed when no changes have been made to the wiki request.
createwiki-request-locked: Message indicating that the wiki request is locked and cannot be edited or commented on.
createwiki-request-updated: Comment sent to the wiki request when it has been updated.
createwiki-rest-disabled: Returned from REST endpoints when the REST API is disabled by disabling $wgCreateWikiEnableRESTAPI
createwiki-rest-mustlogin: Returned from REST endpoints that require that the request be made by a logged-in user
createwiki-rest-notallowed: Returned from REST endpoints when the user making this request is not authorized to perform the requested action
createwiki-rest-usernowikirequests: Returned by the wiki_requests/user/{username} endpoint if the user has not made any wiki requests
createwiki-success: Message when a wiki has successfully been created.
createwiki-success-locked: Success message displayed when a wiki request is locked.
createwiki-success-unlocked: Success message displayed when a wiki request is unlocked.
createwiki-wikinotglobalwiki: Message displayed on the special pages and API when accessed outside of the global wiki
echo-category-title-request-comment: Title for the notification category related to comments on wiki requests.
echo-category-title-request-declined: Title for the notification category when a wiki request is declined.
echo-category-title-request-moredetails: Title for the notification category requesting more details on a wiki request.
echo-category-title-wiki-creation: Title for the notification category related to wiki creation.
echo-pref-tooltip-wiki-creation: Tooltip for the preference to receive notifications about wiki creation.
echo-pref-tooltip-wiki-request-comment: Tooltip for the preference to receive notifications about comments on wiki requests.
echo-pref-tooltip-wiki-request-declined: Tooltip for the preference to receive notifications when a wiki request is declined.
echo-pref-tooltip-wiki-request-moredetai: Tooltip for the preference to receive notifications requesting more details on a wiki request.
ipb-action-requestwiki: The label for the action select option on [[Special:Block]] to block a user from requesting wikis.
notification-createwiki-visit-request: Label for the link to view the wiki request in a notification.
notification-createwiki-wiki-creation-em: Subject of the email notification when a wiki is created.
notification-createwiki-wiki-creation-vi: Label for the link to visit the newly created wiki in a notification.
notification-header-request-comment: Notification header when a comment is added to a wiki request.
notification-header-request-declined: Notification header when a wiki request is declined.
notification-header-request-moredetails: Notification header requesting more details for a wiki request.
notification-header-wiki-creation: Notification header indicating that the user's wiki has been created.
requestwiki-edit-success: Success message displayed when a wiki request is successfully edited.
requestwiki-error-emailnotconfirmed: Error message shown when the user's email is not confirmed during a wiki request.
requestwiki-error-invalidcomment: Invalid comment/character based on disallowed error message.
requestwiki-error-minlength: Error message shown when the given reason is too short. $1 is the minlength; $2 is the current length.
requestwiki-error-patient:
Multiple wiki requests in the same hour error message.

Wiki creator is a users with a userright.
requestwiki-info-guidance: Introductory guidance text displayed at the top of the wiki request form.
requestwiki-info-guidance-post: Additional guidance displayed after the 'reason' field in the wiki request form.
requestwiki-label-add-comment: Label for the 'Add Comment' button in the wiki request viewer.
requestwiki-label-agreement: Label for the agreement checkbox in the wiki request form.
requestwiki-label-bio: Label for the 'biographical' checkbox in the wiki request form.
requestwiki-label-edit-request: Label for the 'Edit Request' button in the wiki request viewer.
requestwiki-label-purpose: Label for the 'Purpose' dropdown in the wiki request form.
requestwiki-notloggedin: Error message if user tries to request a wiki while not being logged in.
requestwiki-placeholder-subdomain: Placeholder text for the subdomain input field in the wiki request form.
requestwiki-success: Message after a wiki request has been sent successfully.
requestwiki-text: Header text which explains the process of requesting wikis.
requestwiki-unknown: Error message shown when the wiki request does not exist or is inaccessible.
requestwikiqueue-approve: Label for the 'Approve' action in the wiki request handling form.
requestwikiqueue-approved:
Status label indicating the wiki request has been approved.
{{Identical|Approved}}
requestwikiqueue-decline: Label for the 'Decline' action in the wiki request handling form.
requestwikiqueue-declined:
Status label indicating the wiki request has been declined.
{{Identical|Declined}}
requestwikiqueue-info: Introductory information displayed in the wiki request queue.
requestwikiqueue-inreview: Status label indicating the wiki request is under review.
requestwikiqueue-moredetails: Label for the 'More Details' action in the wiki request handling form.
requestwikiqueue-onhold: Label for the 'On Hold' action in the wiki request handling form.
requestwikiqueue-request-info-submission: Instructional text about handling the submission of a wiki request.
requestwikiqueue-request-label-action: Label for the 'Action' selection in the request handling form.
requestwikiqueue-request-label-reason: Label for the 'reason' field in the request details section.
requestwikiqueue-request-label-requested: Used as a label for 'requested at'.
requestwikiqueue-request-label-visibilit: Label for setting the request visibility to 'All' users.
Label for setting the request visibility to 'Deleted'.
Label for setting the request visibility to 'Suppressed'.
requestwikiqueue-search-header: Legend for the search form in the wiki request queue.
requestwikiqueue-section-comments:
'Request comments' section label.
{{doc-important|This means "comments about the request", not "ask for comments"}}
requestwikiqueue-section-details:
'Request details' section label.
{{doc-important|This means "details about the request", not "ask for details"}}
